articles.author: Gabby Hajduk
articles.title: Bears fall to Falcons in Atlanta | Game Recap - ChicagoBears.com
articles.description: The Bears offense had another late-game opportunity to tie or take the lead, but the unit fell short in a 27-24 loss to the Falcons Sunday in Atlanta.
articles.content:
Fields finished the day as the Bears' leading rusher with 85 yards on 18 carries and a score while completing 14 of 21 passes for 153 yards and a TD, finishing with an 84.0 rating.

articles.title: FCS playoff bracket: Predictions, picks for every FCS playoff game and round - NCAA.com
articles.description: With the complete field released and the first round starting on Saturday, Nov. 26, there's no better time to predict every round and game for the 2022 tournament.
